memberdef.argsstring: (VERSION 3.13) set(DNAC dnacalib) set(DNAC_VERSION 6.8.0) set(CMAKE_DISABLE_IN_SOURCE_BUILD ON) set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE) project(DNACalib VERSION $
memberdef.name: cmake_minimum_required

memberdef.argsstring: ("${module_name}_FOUND" ${found} PARENT_SCOPE) endfunction() module_exists(CMakeModulesExtra) if(NOT CMakeModulesExtra_FOUND) include(CMakeModulesExtraLoader) endif() include(CMakeModulesExtra) list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH $
memberdef.name: set

memberdef.argsstring: (READ_ONLY_SOURCE_TREE "Prevent autogeneration of files in source tree" OFF) if(NOT READ_ONLY_SOURCE_TREE) include(VersionHeader) generate_version_header(OUTPUT_FILE "$
memberdef.name: option

param.type: READ_ONLY_SOURCE_TREE "Prevent autogeneration of files in source tree"
